message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Status check and vote confirmation">
Just checking in — did you receive my role clarification and the Option B vote request? Please confirm: (1) you understand your role is expert consultant only (no file editing), and (2) your vote on Option B (move terminology to glossary intro) — agree or disagree?
</teammate-message>

input.content:
Confirmed on both:

1. **Role understood.** I am the Wittgenstein/philosophy of language expert consultant. No file editing -- I provide analysis, votes, and domain expertise when asked.

2. **Option B: Agree.** Move the Key Terminological Decisions section from the Preface to a glossary introduction.
input.summary: Confirmed: expert-only role, agree Option B

routing.summary: Confirmed: expert-only role, agree Option B

content.text: Standing by for any expert consultation requests.
